body_html: My resnet101 network is being trained using slim and NCHW format, but it is slower. Epoch time is 17 hours in NHWC format, but using NCHW slows down to 22 hours. It's strange because according to docs, batch_norm, convolution and max_pooling are faster using NCHW. Any thoughts on that?
body_text: My resnet101 network is being trained using slim and NCHW format, but it is slower. Epoch time is 17 hours in NHWC format, but using NCHW slows down to 22 hours. It's strange because according to docs, batch_norm, convolution and max_pooling are faster using NCHW. Any thoughts on that?
body: My resnet101 network is being trained using slim and NCHW format, but it is slower. Epoch time is 17 hours in NHWC format, but using NCHW slows down to 22 hours. It's strange because according to docs, batch_norm, convolution and max_pooling are faster using NCHW. Any thoughts on that?
